basics.name: NGUYE N MINH QUA N
basics.summary:
I'm a Data Scientist with IT background and strong in problem-solving. I have experience in SQL, NLP, 
data science pipeline, machine learning and deep learning. I also have knowledge in software and 
programing. I can code in Java, Python, HTML, CSS, Javascript. I have over one year experience in 
implement data science projects such as: building predicting model, text classify, dashboard, API, time 
series analysis, customer segment, name entities recognition, Chatbot... 
 
During my study, I published two research papers about Chatbot and OCR in HUTECH science 
conference 2022. I also join the final round of the HUTECH Startup Wings Contest as an AI software 
startup project.
